price: 59. Que de cités n’avons-Nous pas anéanties lorsque (leurs habitants) ont été injustes ; et Nous avons fixé l’instant de leur destruction.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-qurā ahlaknāhum lammā ẓalamū wajaʿalnā limahlikihim mawʿidan
